Reviews.Author: Leonardo Morgado V.
Reviews.Content: I ordered a Samsung Galaxy S III Mini but it has a problem to turn it on and the battery is not original, nowhere it says samsung. I'm very disappointed.

Reviews.Title: The Product can't read micro sd
Reviews.Author: Alberto Fernandez
Reviews.Content: I am not satisfied because the Samsung Galaxy s 3 mini that i bought can't read micro sd. I would like to know what can i do if i live in Venezuela.

Reviews.Title: Battery Life, Drop Outs
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: Good -1) Delivery prompt and in excellent condition.2) Display excellent.3) Feature rich.4) Full User's manuals in various languages available on the manufacturers site.5) The language switch over from German easy and a non-issue. And no, I don't read German.6) Apps, like GasBuddy, easy to install and work well in large metro areas.7) Overall comparable to my work iPhone with exceptions noted below.Bad -1) Charging overnight last from ~6AM - ~3PM with WiFi and GPS off, brightness @50% with less than 1 hour of talk time. Repeated these results for several days; never achieved acceptable battery life. This was THE deal breaker.2) The dropouts and lack of service could be poor carrier service - AT&T;'s GSM. Often had NO service with 3 bars. Signal strength varied >10db with the phone sitting on a table, no known local EM interference, and fair WX. When traveling, one needs good coverage - not excellent, just good. This phone/carrier combo did NOT deliver minimally acceptable service.Other thoughts -1) 3-star (neutral) rating because of the uncertainties involved.2) Possibly a one-off lemon on the phone, but I don't play roulette - hoping the next spin will be a winner.3) Case/cover and screen protectors I ordered/received are a loss.4) Amazon refund prompt and hassle free. This was the only bright spot in the deal.

Reviews.Title: Great little phone
Reviews.Author: Tom in Texas
Reviews.Content: If you're looking for a top of line or state of the art phone, keep looking.  If you're wanting to find a cheap, basic Android phone, keep looking.But if you're looking for something in between, the SIII Mini fills that space nicely.  With the same size screen as current iPhones, there it is big enough to be easy to use, but small enough to still fit nicely into a pocket.  Processing power is good enough for the apps I use, video playback, etc.  In short, this little phone will do everything for a reasonable price.My only complaint is that audio levels through the earbuds when playing video are a little low.

Reviews.Title: Just perfect!
Reviews.Author: Cesar A
Reviews.Content: It's the best phone I ever had! The right size, smooth performance. Enough internal storage for my needs... The materials are better than expected. the glass is oil proof so no fingerprints most times. The battery life its way better than other smartphones. The camera takes pretty sharp pictures. I'm very pleased with this purchase.

Reviews.Title: French
Reviews.Author: Mauro S. A. Anna "MSAS"
Reviews.Content: All the printed materials were in French and the AC adapt or was EU standard. It was easy to switch the phone's language to English and an AC adapter to US plug was thrown in the packaging; the phone itself had the manufacture's sticker intact.As to the phone, it's smaller and lighter than both the S2 and S3, this one is te rigth size for a shirt pocket. Despite that, the screen is larger than my old LG Optimus.Very satisfied.

Reviews.Title: the phone is not new, it is a rebuilt phone, for that reason the battery is not the original, also the battery is bad, the phone
Reviews.Author: jose sanchez
Reviews.Content: the phone is not new, it is a rebuilt phone, for that reason the battery is not the original, also the battery is bad, the phone does not work at all, I want my money back,

Reviews.Title: Do Not Buy From This Company
Reviews.Author: Andie G
Reviews.Content: I purchased this phone for my husband for Christmas. He has been using it for six months and it is already giving him problems. The phone keeps stating that the head phone or charger is plugged in when they are not. This is in addition to the phone freezing up often and shutting it self off on its own. Another issue we found is that he was unable to purchase the warranty through Straight Talk. We didnt think this was a big deal because we thought that  the company had a one year warranty when we purchased this phone.However when I went into my amazon account to exchange it, I found out that I cannot. SO after spending over $200 I have to purchase another phone five months later!

Reviews.Title: Dont buy at Wireless Experts Inc.
Reviews.Author: Hector Moreno
Reviews.Content: I bough 14 NEW phones and Wireless Experts sent me refurbished phones, I cant return it because the phones is on Venezuela!, the box came without the secure tape, and the label was incorrect.No compren en Wireless Experts. Yo pedi 14 telefonos nuevos y ellos me enviaron Reconstruidos! no tienen cinta de seguridad y la etiqueta en la caja era incorrecta.

Reviews.Title: NOT for texting
Reviews.Author: Enrique Bozzo
Reviews.Content: This phone is OK overall, but with a BIG defect.Although it is not small, it is almost impossible to write a text since you are always touching the very sensitive keys by the side of the one you intend to, unless you have pointed fingers!This is an exasperating waste of time.It would be  great with a slide out qwerty keyboard.

Reviews.Title: 0 star
Reviews.Author: Felix S.
Reviews.Content: this device is the worst I've purchased in the last 20 years, it seems, is rebuilt, the box came with the phone, charging cables, one does not work, the home key either, not as may mislead people with this type of sale, 0 points for amazon and sellers

Reviews.Title: The cell was reported as stolen
Reviews.Author: Lebz
Reviews.Content: the store sold me this phone and the IMEI code is reported as stolen. Don't buy any product of this store.

Reviews.Title: REFURBISHED
Reviews.Author: KARLA VILLAMIZAR
Reviews.Content: This phone is refurbished.I took him to a Samsung Service Centre and they was told me that this phone is refurbished; their serials do not match.

Reviews.Title: Very good cel phone
Reviews.Author: Jose Antonio
Reviews.Content: Very good cel phone, This phone is easy to use and the display is large, the configuration is excelent. I recommend this cel phone.

Reviews.Title: Help for Straight Talk subscribers
Reviews.Author: Jaxter
Reviews.Content: Is this phone unlocked? Well it is but there are steps to take if you use Straight Talk otherwise you can't access mobile data.Straight Talk use AT&T; and T-Mobile carriers and you get to pick which when you buy get your sim card. If you travel I strongly suggest you get an AT&T; sim for your phone as T-Mobile is more often found in large metros such as SF, NY, etc..To change your VPN settings for Straight Talk visit http://smartphonematters.com/help/help-setting-up-straight-talk-data-and-mms-on-the-blu-tank-4-5-running-android-4-1/ to create a Straight Talk mobile network and set the values.It's a great little phone (at least from my experience since it arrived a few days ago) and for the price who could complain given the OS, apps and HUGE internal memory. The latter is a big problem with other phones as the internal memory is where most apps reside and that memory fills rapidly.Buy one. I don't regret it.

Reviews.Title: Does work with At&t;
Reviews.Author: Brittany Allyson Denton
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my husband for his birthday and after spending two hours with At&t; found out that it wouldn't work with their network. My husband could call me but I couldn't call him and the internet wouldn't work at all. At&t;'s computers couldn't even recognize this phone. If someone plans to use this with At&t; I say don't bother the time. It's a darling little phone but not worth the hassle of it not working.

Reviews.Title: Return
Reviews.Author: rose fuller
Reviews.Content: Im Returning this because it randomly calls people as soon as I end a call and something is wrong with the volume it changes so much on its own sometimes its so quiet I have to have it on speaker and even when its on speaker its barely louder then when not. and the person cant understand me bc I still have it up to my face. The Bluetooth doesn't work half the time. What a rip off!!

Reviews.Title: Right size, right price
Reviews.Author: Bill L.
Reviews.Content: I have been using cell phones since they were all Motorola, and in shoulder bags.  I have not been impressed with the size of the modern smartphones over the past several years because they have been increasing in size, and I am unsure why we have decided that after years of bricks being the only thing you could get in a cell phone, we want to go back to carrying bricks as cell phones.  Once you add a Ballistic or Otterbox hybrid case to most cell phones, they really do not fit into a pocket anymore.  Enter the Mini line of Galaxy smart phones.  They are very easily stashed in a pocket, held in a hand, and operate with all the newest bells and whistles without carrying a brick.  I went S III Mini over S 4 Mini because there is no point to overbuying Android tech, and next year, once the price on the S 4 Mini has plummeted in the wake of the S 5, I will simply upgrade.  This is the perfect phone at the right price for even many power users like myself who use a phone for way more than making phone calls.

Reviews.Title: Beware Using in the USA but this is a very nice full featured phone
Reviews.Author: Sharon555
Reviews.Content: This is a great phone feature wise. I have a samsung galaxy S4 and I use AT&T; in the USA. It function a tad slower but overall its great when I ran it on WIFI. For the price its outstanding it almost performs as well as my galaxy S4. I gave it 3 stars based on its functionality and if you do not care about data rate when not on WIFI. I think the issue is the same on T-Mobile in the USA But do not know that first hand. What I do know first hand is that on AT&T;, I spent hours with them, and could only get Edge to work. 3G did pop up sometimes for a few seconds. The issue is that it is a GSM phone and will work well as a phone and EDGE. For data these models do not support the frequencies requires for 3G 850/1900 it has 900/1900. You will only get EDGE rates and for a smartphone that is unacceptable this why I took off two stars. it will work fine just slow away from WIFI. I did have other issues but those were unit specific I did not let those affect my rating as it was defective not intrinsic to the product. This is a very nice product just not on AT&T; as a minimum.

Reviews.Title: Last one week
Reviews.Author: dimitar gochev
Reviews.Content: I love Samsung product, but I am very disappointed from this one. Since day one I had to charge the battery every day with no much use. After one week the screen went dead. Now I have to deal with all return headache.After I install new battery, the phone works just fine.I give three stars because of bad customer service

Reviews.Title: bad product
Reviews.Author: Oscar Sanchez Sierra
Reviews.Content: i bought that cell phone and since the firts time i used, worked bad.itself off, not working properly, does not load well and I have tried to communicate with amazon and nobody gives me an answer its a bad phone and lousy service, although I have the warranty, no one gives me solution

Reviews.Title: Good phone at a good price
Reviews.Author: M. Amerson
Reviews.Content: This is probably the most affordable phone that can run Android Jellybean. It's basically a tuned-down and smaller version of the S3. But that doesn't make it a slouch. I use it to video chat with my parents from Africa to the US. I like the idea that I can go where I want, pop a sim into it and start talking without hassling with unlocks or anything else. The only issue I have with it so far is that the battery does not last too long. I suppose needing a daily charge is normal for smart phones, but I've had phones that could do better.I wish I had bought one for my girlfriend too!

Reviews.Title: Model I8190 Samsung warranty not cover in USA
Reviews.Author: Daniel
Reviews.Content: Be aware of this phone model GT-I8190 is an international model number so if the phone brakes Samsung USA is not going to repair or replace the phone for you.  If the phone brakes during the first three months, you can return it to amazon but if brakes after 3 months you have to report the problem to Samsung and they are not going to fix the issue for you.  In summary,  Amazon should not allow re-seller to sell international phones to US customer!!!

Reviews.Title: 4 days lifetime defective battery.
Reviews.Author: Felipe Miron Navarro
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone and after 4 days using it the battery just stopped working at all, not even charging.I've never drop the phone, there is no scratches on it, so FOR SURE they've sold me a defective battery.I tried to contact them two times, warning them that I just have a few days in US, so I needed my problem to be solved ASAP and they message back with: We will be open in January 2, happy new year!( keep in mind that my 2nd claim was in January 3).And I'm not asking a new phone for them, just a new battery which costs about 15$, so if you don't want a HEADACHE go buy it for another seller!I stood my whole European Trip without a phone because of this defective 4 lifetime days.

Reviews.Title: Sometimes newer isn't better
Reviews.Author: Donna Donaldson "aislinnluv"
Reviews.Content: I bought this to replace my Samsung Galaxy II. Unfortunately, it is more complicated to operate and has fewer of the features I enjoyed with the older model. If I am on Facebook with this phone, I am unable to open links. It is more difficult to do simple tasks on this phone than it was on the older model. The best I can say about this one is that it fits into smaller pockets better. Had I but known, I would not have made this purchase.

Reviews.Title: Wrong Phone
Reviews.Author: Farah
Reviews.Content: I got the original samung galaxy s instead.  There was an lg charger instead of samsung and wasn't unlocked.  The second time i ordered a phone and got totally the opposite.  The Slll is a great phone but hate this seller. Will return!!!

Reviews.Title: All went well with the product
Reviews.Author: Eugenia Martínez
Reviews.Content: Before I bought the product I took a look to the previous reviews and I was afraid that the product was not exactly what they said, as there were people who complained about that, but for my good I received exactly what they described.The cellphone is internationaly unlocked, I put my chip and it worked perfectly.

Reviews.Title: great phone
Reviews.Author: Michael Foster
Reviews.Content: i am extremely pleased with this phone. I didn't want one of the bigger phonesthat you couldn't fit in your pocket. no problems, does almost every thing myGalaxy 3 notebook does

Reviews.Title: Garbage
Reviews.Author: Patrick de Picciotto
Reviews.Content: A few weeks after buying this phone battery ran out and would not charge anymore. Sent to Samsung dealer who said battery was not original and had to be replaced which I did for $50. Now the same thing happened with this new battery and there is no way I can recharge it. Took to several shops and they all said it s hopeless, I should throw the phone away! Worst possible experience!

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Gilda Nunes
Reviews.Content: This phone is excellent. All the best things that a SIII has to offer but in a much practical size. Love it!

Reviews.Title: Felicitas
Reviews.Author: Felicitas
Reviews.Content: It is a very good smartphone, it is in excellent condition,it works very well. Im pleased with the purchase .Its a well combination between price and quiality.

Reviews.Title: No warranty, no thanks
Reviews.Author: Jojosdad1 "M543 Marine Wrecker"
Reviews.Content: I was about to purchase the mini until I read the part about no warranty. What? come again, you expect folks to dish out $230 for a phone that has no warranty? No thanks.

Reviews.Title: so many problems

Reviews.Content: I buy this phone from this seller, and i only have problems with the phone, first the battery only works for a couple of hours, and i had to buy o new battery because only in one week the battery stop charging, also, when i made a call i can hear anything only in loudspeaker , so also it has the normal speaker of the phone bad. i leave the phone in a technical center and the told to me that the phone was refurbished, because it has a label on the back where the battery is that means that.

Reviews.Title: telefono dañado

Reviews.Content: good afternoon,I need someone to answer me on the equipment you buy in past days which get damaged is the second time this has happened,,, which means that you are not serious, I dedicate to give these bad Related Web pages amazon until you get a solution to my problemregards

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Luinia Nouel
Reviews.Content: Excellent phone support in Venezuela with Digitel ... I'm happy with my new purchase, perfect size and I recommend it to everyone.

Reviews.Title: The right unlocked smartphone for me.
Reviews.Author: Mary
Reviews.Content: The phone is just the right size and weight and has all of the features that I wanted. I can text, check my email, listen to music & FM radio. This is my first smart phone. I am using it with Consumer Cellular's low priced no contract plan, which is excellent.I bought a cute cover for the phone: Flip PU Leather Case Cover For Samsung Galaxy S3 Mini i8190 + Protector PC445. I am very happy that I bought this phone. Thanks.

Reviews.Title: Great Value with all the Features
Reviews.Author: A DeBarge
Reviews.Content: We bought this phone as a gift but I think we will be buying another one for us. It is smaller than the HTC we have. The phone fits comfortably in your hand but still gives you a nice big screen. The features and function of this phone are great and it arrived on time and in good condition. We are very happy with this purchase.

Reviews.Title: It is GREAT!
Reviews.Author: Irwing Carrillo

Reviews.Title: Great phone from seller Top10cell fulfilled by amazon
Reviews.Author: NYC
Reviews.Content: I purchased a phone that was advertised as new from Pacific Cellular and received a used phone.  The phone arrived without a seal on the box, battery was not in a sealed wrapper and took too long to charge and discharged early. You could see that the phone had been previously handled, with fingerprints all over the back and front cover.  Thank goodness for amazon, as their staff were very helpful in getting a full refund.  I recommend avoiding The seller and choosing one whose products are "fulfilled by amazon".  I did wind up reordering the same phone from Top10cell, fulfilled by amazon and the phone arrived within 3 business days.  The phone arrived with 2 seals on the box, which clearly states to not accept if broken or missing.  Inside, the blacking and contents were as they should be, battery in its sealed case and NO fingerprints all over the phone!  The phone itself is very nice, this far it has been working quite well and seems to have a boatload of features for the price.  I will leave the technical review for the techies...and there is a great one by a "daisy s."  I recommend getting a micro sad card to increase storage space...I got a 32 gb card.  So, in summary, thumbs up for the phone, an excellent buy, thumbs way up for seller Top10cell and amazon...thumbs way down for Pacific Cellular distributor, out of Idaho.

Reviews.Title: I Like This Galaxy SIII mini!
Reviews.Author: Mitless
Reviews.Content: For phones, I like Samsung products. I was looking for a simple (unlocked) phone with no contract. There were so many to choose from. I have heard that the Galaxy S4 is really good with so many features; however it is bigger and requires a contract. Being pragmatic as I am with a budget in mind for a phone, I came across this phone while searching at Amazon. I'm a Prime member and thus, am qualified for a 6 month 0 interest financing. The pebble blue SIII mini is really good and still has many features as a phone. I bought this phone from Worldwide Distributors (very good) and the phone (Android 4.1.2) arrived earlier than the target delivery date. The phone has a French language manual (European model). Being familiar with Android phones and tablets, it was easier for me to browse through the settings and change the language setting in English (US). I have disabled the apps that I don't use and battery life is very satisfactory. I like the 4 inch screen and it's perfect for my hand. I bought the CIMO black case cover and the color blended perfectly with the pebble blue. The CIMO cover really surprised me and it fits perfectly on the phone.I would highly recommend this Samsung Galaxy SIII mini to those people who will use it primarily as a phone. Of course, there are so many features and apps that goes with it if you want to connect to the internet or use it with a plan. In my case, I use the tablet/s for my internet browsing or other tasks related to it. Enjoy shopping at Amazon!

I can't believe how easy this one is to operate, most functions actually make sense. Something I didn't have on previous "Smartphones". I love the size and weight, especially compared to the Blackberry, the screen is crystal clear. Battery seems to perform well. I do advise getting a gel case for it immediately I don't know how much "abuse" this one can take. It doesn't feel cheap, but it appears it would be realatively delicate. If you bounce your phone off the wall daily, this one probably is not for you. So far, so good for me. I ordered a  gel case when I ordered the phone only to find out later it was being sent from Hong Kong. Buyer beware. I don't know how you are supposed to know that when you place your order. I couldn't figure a rhyme or reason to it and only found out when I "tracked" the order.  Oh well, it will be here by the 4th of July and I will certainly celebrate.(Great phone!)

Reviews.Title: Great Phone - Much better than my iPhone!
Reviews.Author: Tony "tbux"
Reviews.Content: I used to be a big fan of iphones, with their ease-of-use and huge app store.  Now I'm an even bigger fan of Samsung!I've had several Samsung phones over the years.  Most of them fell short.  But Samsung has gotten their act together and no longer competes with Apple, but instead, blows them out of the water!This phone's display was larger and much better than my iphone, though the phone itself is the same size - which is something I like! It's also lighter than an iphone.  And, since we're on the subject, I prefer the sleeker more rounded style of the Samsung. I also like the fact that you can upgrade (inexpensively) the memory.  It comes with 8GB, but I bought a 32 GB micro SD card for $20, and I now have a 40GB phone! One last comparison... The price! This is soooo much cheaper than an unlocked iphone.This phone is smaller than the regular Galaxy S III (hence, "mini").  But still packs amazing features. It used a regular mini SIM card (not a micro SIM), and has a MicroSD slot inside (up to 32GB).The ease of use is wonderful and the style is great.I liked this phone so much, that after only 2 weeks of owning it, I bought one for my wife! (And she loves her's too!)FYI - This phone is an international phone. It came with a European charger, but had an American adapter.  You can also charge it via USB (included).  My two phones both were in a foreign language when first starting - One in French, the other in German. However the first thing in the set-up process was to choose a language. Very easy! I did have to get into settings to change from a 24-hour format to a 12-hour format, and change Celsius to Fahrenheit - both were very easy to do in "Settings".This phone is unlocked and will work with GSM carriers (AT&T;, T-Mobile, etc... Not Verizon). I bought ours to use with Straight Talk. Easy set-up, easy access, GREAT PHONE!I just took a vacation and had no internet service... That is until I used this phone as a secure hotspot. The benefits keep adding up!Since this is not the regular Galaxy S III, I was worried about finding accessories.  No problem!  I found chargers (it uses a micro USB, like many other products), cases, skins, etc...If you need a phone, this is the best $300 you'll ever spend!!!

They should NOT have deemed or claimed that this phone is "new" this phone is obviously USED. Reviews.Title: Slim, sleek Android phone - and yes it is "foreign"
Reviews.Author: Suz
Reviews.Content: I've had this phone in hand for more than a week, with T-Mobile service for about a day now. It's fine so far.The phone is a lovely, sleek thing. I've handled its bigger brother, the Galaxy SIII, but that phone is just too big for me. I like the form and size of this one much better. I've been using an HTC Evo 4G phone for more than two years; this Galaxy S3 Mini is about the same size.This is a good phone with plenty of computing horsepower for me. The screen is beautiful and very responsive. In side-by-side comparison to my trusty old HTC Evo phone, this one blows the other one away. And the Galaxy S3 Mini has a slightly smaller screen! I'd wondered if I'd regret it for that reason but I absolutely do not. I don't even realize that the screen is smaller than my old phone, when I'm using this phone.One downside: I don't like the camera. It's laggy.By the way, my phone arrived with packaging in French, and set up with the French language on the phone. The seller included a plug adapter so the Euro style plug on the charger can be used here in the USA. It took a few seconds to get into the phone settings and choose US English as the phone language.PLEASE, people, don't complain if you get a "foreign" phone when you buy this phone unlocked. Because Samsung doesn't package this phone for sale for the US market. (Search for an article on Cnet called "Apple drops patent claim against Samsung Galaxy S3 Mini" from December 2012 for the background.) I found a user manual in English by going to Samsung's UK website (it won't be on Samsung's US website because Samsung doesn't sell or support this phone in the US). If you must have an unlocked phone tailored for US users right out of the box? Try buying an unlocked iPhone direct from Apple, or a Nexus 4 phone from Google (if the Nexus 4 is back in stock).

Reviews.Title: Beware of all Unlocked International Cell Phones
Reviews.Author: Helena Chechopoulos
Reviews.Content: It's a great cell phone if you want a throw away but at that price it's not for me.  Don't try to update the OS on this phone because if you have a problem Samsung US doesn't support it.  Samsung International won't support it either unless you are in Europe.  That information is not disclosed by Amazon or the seller.  The only thing that Amazon can do is take it back and give you a refund which they did in my case.  Beware of all unlocked cell phones that are International.

Reviews.Content: I was skeptical of getting a phone online, but this was exactly the phone I needed. The phone is AWESOME and the store people that I have showed this too one have not ever seen one and two are way jealous!! They loved it... Phone was brand new and came in the original box with all the materials (USB, Charger (This came with an international plug as well), ear phones.. etc) Could not have gone better. I saved a fortune over the retail stores. I set this up with Straight Talk and it is fantastic... Saving a fortune over contract providers... Takes a little legwork, but well worth the effort. Just do not expect any help from the retailers. One tried to tell me I was committing a felony... HAHAHA! Idiot.. This is a factory unlocked phone, this is not illegal, so do not believe them... It is only illegal to unlock a carrier provided and sponsored phone!!! Needless to say I walked out and did not buy anything from them...

Reviews.Title: Best Phone My Wife Has Ever Had
Reviews.Author: Bill A. Belt
Reviews.Content: My wife's phone (an EVO) keep dropping service and would not accept rings, rather rolling over to voice mail immediately. At first we thought there was a problem with the service provider. We were given a second phone however it preformed the same as the first phone. We then received this Samsung Galaxy S 111 phone and it has been great. No more failure to ring and no dropped calls. We are convinced the issues were phone related and not service related. This is a true smart phone in all aspects. I use an iPhone and the first thing we tried was to locate an establishment. We both have 4g service. The Samsung outperforms the iPhone by a great margin. The screen is slightly larger and much more brighter. There are great apps, in fact more than you will ever need or use so don't let a competitor's brag about having lots of apps turn you off.The apps are easy to download and install. Everything that was on the EVO was easily transferred to the Galaxy. There are a limited number of incoming phone ring tones however you can download additional rings if there are none that suit you. We did find that with the sue of hearing aids the ring tones installed as somewhat weak and only a few can be turned up really loud.My wife uses the phone a  greta dal for texting and the larger key board makes that much easier on this phone. Providers may try to sell, you insurance on the phone which we found to be extremely high thus we did not purchase and with the amazing record we have with this phone so far that too was a very good decision.The cell phone is thin and slick thus I would highly recommend a plastic case cove for the phone to help with your grip.

Reviews.Title: I FEEL CHEATED
Reviews.Author: Simón Rodríguez
Reviews.Content: Good night, by this I address you in order to convey what happened to a mobile computer that buy one of their vendors. The purchase was made on 4 December and the team arrived on January 20th through the global shipping company zoom. The team arrived in good condition, in box and appeared to be new.While the phone is turned off and did not turn; I took the phone to a central Samsung-caracas service to find out what happened to the phone and pass the reader advised me that the phone code had not been found and therefore this was a rebuilt phone and was not original so Samsung could not be responsible for the team and they suggested writing to the seller.I wrote to the seller and I explained what happened to the team, to which he replied that their policies regarding returns after 30 days of order delivery your company does not assume any responsibility. But do not stay satisfied with your answer as to start the product I received does not meet the characteristics of the equipment I bought, that is to say, I bought a new original equipment and got a rebuilt and aftermarket equipment, so I would helping me get the money I lost. I also want to add that I feel cheated and that the seller does not seem a responsible person; I find just lose my money. I hope to help me with my situation

Reviews.Title: Not a good phone
Reviews.Author: james s.
Reviews.Content: I have had this phone for about 6 months now. Systematic symptoms keep appearing as time progresses. One of the first things that started was after about a month or so. There is a wicked echo that people on the other side can hear, but you can not. This is a major problem when you get into an automated system. It hears itself and keeps erroring out because it cant understand your response even though you dont say anything. Later on another symptom that started coming up is that the touch screen bugs out. Sometimes it will not recognize, sometimes it will click all over the place nonstop untill you restart and sometimes it has a 5-10 second lag. Alot of people on the other end can not hear me well. I have been told it is like talking to someone through a sheet rock wall. Its just really muffled. Another problem is that it apps do not like to run properly. sometimes I will to have to close it out and reopen it several times. Another problem is that when it charges, it will charge up to the point it is 100%, then it turns itself off. So almost everyday I wake up to my phone being off. That or i watch it real close when i'm at work and unplug it at 95%. Another problem thats is kinda strange is that it does not like cold. If it gets cold (like 60 or less) the touch screen will not work, and someitmes it will turn itself off. It works fine if you keep in your pocket, but when i leave it on the bedside table at night during the winter i wake up to a non-functioning phone. This thing is garbage. I will be tossing it in the bricked phone drawer when i get enough $ to get away from it. Who knows, I may take it outside and give it the proper "office space" treatment.

I replaced the battery but the phone no longer receives a cell signal (other than At&t;) which I don't have. I attempted to get service through every avenue I could think of, to include the vendor, samsung (US), and then finally samsung latin america (which is the only place which will honor the factory warranty) in the end Samsung latin america told me there was nothing more they can do for me since they no longer have contracted repair facilities in the US. This phone is now nothing more than a wifi surfing tool (Im going to sell it online to recoup some of my expense by the way I can only get 49.95 for it) this phone was a waste of time and money and now with everything I have been out of a phone for almost a month. Thanks for nothing, I will NEVER buy from this company again, my advice is to buy a phone from the US, it might be a little more, but its worth the peace of mind, just in case something goes wrong.

Reviews.Title: Nice phone. Small, Durable. A little complicated.
Reviews.Author: Steve in Ohio
Reviews.Content: This phone was surprisingly packed with features and is more durable than I expected.It seamlessly synced up with my Google account and downloaded all of my apps that I had on my Android tablet and all of my Google and Facebook contacts. I didn't even ask it to, didn't know it could, it just did it. That made life easy.I also downloaded the Media Monkey app and was able to transfer my music library easily to the 32G card. No need for an ipod anymore.Durability - I don't have a case for it yet and it is a little slippery.The first day I had it I dropped it on my ceramic tile floor - no damage. A week or so later I almost fell down some steps outside my house. The hand I had to use to stop my fall had my unprotected cell-phone in it. The phone smacked a concrete ledge while I was gripping it and slid right on the corner with quite a bit of my 230 lbs on it. I thought the phone was done, expected a shattered screen or at least deep gouges on the back. Not a scratch.I owned a cell-phone store for 17 years and would highly recommend the S III Mini.The only drawback is some of the operation isn't quite intuitive enough. I.E. I didn't know my alarm was off and was getting up for work. It doesn't tell you it is off or on, you would have to know that if the clock icon is green, it is on, if it is black, it is off. It also took me like 2 days to figure out where some messages were going and why alerts were happening. I'm sure it is all in the manual but simple words like off/on, press here for message etc. would be nice. I'm not a fan of ambiguous icons.The only other complaint is the speaker when listening to music is not very loud, even on the headset. Plugged in to my home or car stereo it Rocks though. I am going to try an amplified headset and see how that works.I had a couple of iphones for years and bottom line is I thing this phone easily outshines them and won't hold your music hostage.

I don't carry a purse so my phone is in my hand or pocket when I go somewhere. I was so upset to find out the phone I have wanted for over a year was too big and ackward for me. Then, as I was searching around for a different phone that I could afford, I saw that they had a mini! It was a great price compared to all the others I looked at. It has everything I need in it and fits comfortablely in my hand and pocket. If you looking for a great phone that is is not large then this is a great match. It works beautifully and has an awesome camera that takes front and back pictures. I can take pictures of my son and with my son without worrying about holding the phone right. Reviews.Title: Less than I expected
Reviews.Author: James Dammen
Reviews.Content: I had such high hopes for this phone. But i'm plagued with issues, first, in the past four weeks the battery has only charged up past 73% once, this is after a full 8 hours on the charger. Second the battery lasts about a day and a half on a good day,on a bad day about 6 hours. That's probably because it doesn't fully recharge. Third, I thought I was buying a 8 GB version, when looking at the stats in the phone, I have about 4GB of memory. That means the OS is taking up about 4 GB! Now connectivity, I've seen 3G about 4 days out of the last month, that could be my area or not close enough to a tower(within a mile). I'm not sure how this other issue happens, it's a GSM phone, when I go to a CDMA only area, the phone loses all service, refuses to be charged and doesn't shut off. Service it shows a circle with a line through it, I can connect to hot spots and blue tooth items, but cannot make or recieve calls. I've tried four different chargers, none work unless I'm in a GSM area, same chargers!!!!  This next issue happened on two different weekends in the same town that is CDMA only. I held the power button and selected "power off" with 10% battery left, two hours later the phone flashed and beeped indicating low battery so i shut the phone off again. The next day it flashed again and beep, I checked the phone there was 1% left, I just left it alone after that. That was last weekend, when I got back into a GSM area I plugged it into a charger, it took almost 20 minutes before the phone would turn on to check the charge status. It charged up to 73% and stopped charging. I know the problems, but, I really like the phone, too. I'm going to try getting a new battery or multiple batteries. And I'm gonna try some different setting in the APN, maybe that will help the area issue. Hopefully I can work the bugs out. Seriously if you don't know anything about electronics, stay with the trusted carriers.

Reviews.Content: Half a year to buy this phone makes and it has gone very well, arrived in perfect condition, worked directly on the Movistar en my country without any problems, and I bought it as a gift for my mother and she is fascinated.

Reviews.Title: problems
Reviews.Author: DCJL
Reviews.Content: After 6 weeks, some problems may be resolved.  Took about 20 tries to get Samsung account, it worked out of the blue after doing the same steps over and over and over.  Phone was sending photos in Firefox format to computer.  Finally had computer checked out, it was not the problem.  Firefox photos not compatible with any normal programs.  Finally found a roundabout way to send them, so now hope it will work in the future.  Tried to send phone back, but too late for buyer protection program and seller would not accommodate.  I think it is a nice phone, pretty, easy to manipulate,  but would never recommend that particular seller again.  Asked if it is a refurbished phone, never got an answer, which tells me it must be.  It has a Russian app, so maybe it was manufactured in Russia.  Samsung advised finding out, said it is not U.S. made, but seller said they did not understand the question (??) Had an Apple before this one.  The Samsung settings are very easy to follow and understand, so definitely recommend that.

Reviews.Title: great for the price
Reviews.Author: gr8 user "gr8 user"
Reviews.Content: Looks sharp. Good quality.  The volume button on the side sjt be a bit easier to push. But otherwise great,

Reviews.Title: SAMSUNG GALAXY S III MINI - UNLOCKED
Reviews.Author: S. C. Ferguson
Reviews.Content: THIS IS A GOOD RUNNING PHONE ANE IS QUICK TO BRING UP APPS THAT ARE ON IT.  ONLY DRAW BACK IS THE BATTERY - NEEDS TO BE CHARGED AFTER 1 (ONE) DAY.

Reviews.Title: Huge mobile
Reviews.Author: Andres Lopez Jimenez
Reviews.Content: This phone meets the requirements and this is a great phone service store has a rapid, secure delivery and quality definitely recommend this product

Reviews.Title: It is a gamble.
Reviews.Author: Eric J Pomeroy
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone for my wife because it had pretty good reviews, it worked fine for about a week then the battery stopped taking a charge and the phone displayed a weird message with the droid mascot. I figured it was just a bad battery so I purchased a new one, the same thing keeps happening. At least 3 times a week the phone randomly stops keeping a charge, shuts off, and I have to swap the battery out. I had to buy an external battery charger to keep her phone charged. The phone is obviously defective but my wife tossed the packaging because she foolishly assumed the phone would work for more than a week. This is the first time I have purchased a phone online and I definitely regret it.

Reviews.Title: Ok for now
Reviews.Author: BC
Reviews.Content: Needed a small, basic smart phone and this one was available and ticked all the right boxes. At first seemed fine but as you add more apps it generally slows down considerably. I would rate the cell reception at my house as poor at best, 1/5 bars signal. My previous Galaxy Nexus on the same network had 4/5 bars regularly in the same place. Another thing to note is that the phone I received was from France, the seller included instructions to set the default language to English which worked but there were also several preloaded apps that still had to be manually changed. Another geographical issue is the kies system for online updating via a usb connection will not work.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Product
Reviews.Author: J. Araujo "Tactical"
Reviews.Content: Excellet Samsung Phone this has everything exced my needs also the size is perfect the android apps are excellentthis is the perfect phone

Reviews.Title: I HATE THIS PHONE!!!
Reviews.Author: micaela
Reviews.Content: I got this phone as a Christmas present from my boyfriend. I looked up the reviews and did my research which is the only reason I bought the dang thing: the reviews were/are great.  The phone arrived Dec 18-20 I dont really remember exactly and I put the straighttalk SIM card in it and activated it. No problem. Then I went to use it and the data doesnt work....something about APN settings?? so I have only been able to use the internet on the phone at home when I have wifi but then its just like whats the point because I have my laptop. Well I figured I could learn to live without data while Im out and about but then it wouldnt let me receive picture messages either even when connected to wifi at home. NOT gonna work. So once again I gave the little phone the benifit of the doubt. Well about a week ago it quit receiving calls! it doesnt ring, display that there is an incoming call NOTHING! It rings on the end of the person calling me or throws them straight to voicemail like the phone is off. For a person with a small growing business and horses not being able to receive phone calls is a really bad thing!! I would NOT recommend this phone to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Excellent!
Reviews.Author: Ivan Nava
Reviews.Content: Great Phone, not expensive and my mom is very happy to have it finally and put down her old blackberry

Reviews.Title: slow responsibility and lower battery capacity
Reviews.Author: Wenwen Lin
Reviews.Content: slow responsibility and lower battery capacity, i do not want it any more. Normally, the batterry will be run out in less than 24h.

Reviews.Title: it a good cellphone
Reviews.Author: sorangel  ramirez
Reviews.Content: i like all its fuctions, it is a nice option to a call, text  another and the camera has a good resolution

Reviews.Title: Perfect for Me
Reviews.Author: Harv W. Martens "canuck"
Reviews.Content: I would probably be happier with the S4 but I wanted something to fit in my pocket and didn't want to spend hundreds of dollars.  Happy with it's features and capabilities.  I have owned 2 iPhones and I don't miss them. I use Google+ and have a Gmail email account so the Google integration is very convenient. Sometimes it's a little sluggish.

Reviews.Title: Happy so far
Reviews.Author: jwperry
Reviews.Content: I purchased this phone as a replacement for a Galaxy S4 that was destroyed and the usability is nearly the same. It isn't as fast as an S4(well duh!) but the operating system is nearly identical and easy to switch over to.

Reviews.Title: Amazing product.

Reviews.Content: The phone looked good, operated well. I was planning to gift this to my cousin who lives overseas. I ordered this phone and got it on time, but just 2 days before the journey overseas and when I tried to use the phone with a GSM sim, it said ..

Reviews.Title: Great phone in a small package

Reviews.Content: This phone is everything I was looking for: small size but with good Android functionality.  I switched to this from a Motorola Atrix HD (even bigger than the Moto Atrix II) and while it doesn't do everything the Atrix does, it is a really usable phone.  I gladly sacrifice some functionality for the smaller size in my pocket.

Reviews.Content: Maybe because it's my first smart phone, have used others before, but so far I feel I did not go wrong with this!

Reviews.Title: I like it very much!

Reviews.Content: I think that the Samsung Galaxy III Mini, it's a good product. It has resulted to be very friendly to use.

Reviews.Content: I am very happy with it. I received it on time and just put my chip in it and started to use it.

Reviews.Content: I noticed the the battery didn't hold a charge very long and after about one week, the battery went dead and would not take charge. I purchased a new battery today for $52 and it is working so far.I also cannot add additional folders to my Yahoo mail. All incoming mail goes to inbox - including spam.For now, I am quite displeased with my phone and hoping the vendor will take care of my problems.

Reviews.Title: won't recommend

Reviews.Content: I was very happy when I bought this phone. But battery gets discharged in 16-18 hours, it's horrible, wish i knew it before, would have never bought it.

Reviews.Content: When I bought this I saw reviews saying it has orange logo and all those crapBut the truth s it's a never locked phone and wit Gud functions

Reviews.Title: Easy to use

Reviews.Content: I am using this when in Europe and Asia with various SIM cards.  It works very well and is easy to use without any special training.  I am happy with this purchase.

Reviews.Title: Samsung Galaxy S III Mini I8190 8GB Unlocked GSM Phone with Android 4.1 OS
Reviews.Author: Eustace E. Musgrove "Eustace jr,"
Reviews.Content: Bought it as a gift. The recipient is STILL grinning from ear to ear! Couldn't have done better if I tried!

Reviews.Title: IT IS NOT A BRAND NEW CELL PHONE!!!
Reviews.Author: AMFL
Reviews.Content: Phone reconstructed, I GOT THIS PHONE FROM MONTANA WIRELESS.This IS NOT A BRAND NEW CELL PHONE!!! when I opened the box what do i see? a cell phone with the charger and a car adapter, I thougt so cool that i've a car adapter for no extra price, but when i continue my search what do I find? NOTHING, there's no headphones, no user guide, no paper, ANYTHING! YOU JUST PAY FOR A BOX WITH A PHONE, A CHARGER AND A CAR ADAPTOR, THAT'S IT! Don't buy this, please don't. The phone suddenly "died" after a month of use.ESPAÑOL: EL TELÉFONO ES RECONSTRUIDO, NO ES NUEVO, EN LA PRIMERA SEMANA DAÑO DOS BATERIAS Y AL MES SE COLGÓ Y NO FUNCIONÓ MAS LO LLEVE A REPARACION Y ME INDICARON QUE ERA RECONSTRUIDO Y QUE NO HABIA NADA QUE HACER. SI NO QUIERE PERDER SU DINERO: NO COMPRAR!!!!!

Reviews.Title: Great price/value

Reviews.Content: Great phone for the price. Samsung software, as with the s3 and s4 lags from time to time but nothing unmanageable. The phone is overall fast.My major gripe with this phone is that it does not have a notification led!Also note that this model does not have NFC.

Reviews.Title: Nice Gift for Christmas!
Reviews.Author: tennjoy54
Reviews.Content: I purchased this phone for my daughter for Christmas, but I couldn't wait to give it to her. Her phone was outdated and had a cracked screen...just a pretty cheap phone. She has Straight Talk coverage, she was so pleased to get it, and we also purchased the 2 in 1 folio stand wallet case for it. This is a very easy to operate phone and she has had no problems with it at all. Thanks Amazon!

Reviews.Title: Hi Greetings I found it an excellent product recommended for your shopping thank you very much for your kind attention

Reviews.Content: Is amazing in performance, quality and anothers things. 100% recommend. Is not so expensive for the technology that was maded.

Reviews.Title: excellent
Reviews.Author: Felix G.
Reviews.Content: Thanks so much for the item, im so happy with it and hope to get more item later. appreciate it.

Reviews.Title: No NFC as advertised!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: just activated phone, working great but no NFC capability as advertised!  I would return it but need the phone now.

Reviews.Title: The delivery was perfect, but i dont like that much the s3 itself
Reviews.Author: Jonathan Stern
Reviews.Content: The delivery was perfect, everything on time and the cell phone was in perfect conditions.Besides this, the s3 mini itself its a bit slow, and its already starting to show a few issues (it gets blocked -"colgado" in spanish).

Reviews.Title: Excellent phone but awful keyboard
Reviews.Author: Omar Esgaib
Reviews.Content: excellent phone, nice camera, great apps, had trouble updating apps from google play but 5 minutes in google solve itbut the bad part is the keyboard it has, no way to add words to dictionary, to change from predictive to not predictive in previous phones could be done from the keyboard itself, now you have to go to settings and change it, very ackward

Reviews.Title: samsung s3 mini
Reviews.Author: dexterlobin
Reviews.Content: I had the Samsung Galaxy Note 2 now I use the Note 3 and they are hands down the absolute best phones I ever used.  So when my sister asked me to get her a phone that was a bit cheaper and smaller than mine going Samsung was a no brainer.  I looked at reviews both on Amazon and Youtube of this unit (Samsung Galaxy S III Mini I8190) and decided it would be the best fit for her.  She’s had it now for the past 5 months and loves it! Its small size makes it easy to carry around and tuck away plus it performs beautifully.  So it’s yet another great Samsung product and I would strongly recommend it for someone who is looking for a small device at a reasonable price range but not compromising on quality and performance.

Reviews.Title: good but no so good
Reviews.Author: Miguel Uzcategui
Reviews.Content: I received the telephone it was the model that I ordered but the 3G band's are diferent's from the offer in the advertising said 3G 900, 3G 1900, 3G 2100 but this phone came with 3G 850, so for further information to buyers from Venezuela using Digitel as telephone carrier seek for the S3 mini GT-l8190n (international version). Taking that thought apart the phone it's stable, fast and good looking, the dual core procesor it's enough if you are not a high end user.

Reviews.Title: Good Phone
Reviews.Author: Jose Salgado
Reviews.Content: Working with not problem, just a good choise for those that Do not want a HUGE cell phone, the product arrive on time and with no problem.

Reviews.Title: it was good
Reviews.Author: David Paredes
Reviews.Content: all was fine, in especial the product didn't have any problems and the delivery time was perfect tank you good look with your bissness

Reviews.Title: Samsung Galaxy S III Mini.................
Reviews.Author: Susan Pinckney
Reviews.Content: I am enjoying the mini.  Just a couple of time it locked, but nothing major so far... When it locked I just had to restart.. Enjoying it so far...................

Reviews.Title: Awesome phone
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: the transaction was easy, and arrived in a timely manner.  Unfortuneatly , I had to send it back.  This was my fault.  When reading the discription of the phone, I was looking for compatibility to Verizon.  Which, if I knew what the Network call letters were, I would have realized that this is not a Verizon compatible phone.  After it was too late to stop order, is when I went to Customer Q&A.;  I would still order from this company.  Amazon was great with helping me get a return label and I will receive a refund for the phone.  Thank you for great service!!!!!

Reviews.Title: Satisfied
Reviews.Author: Joshua Kleinman
Reviews.Content: After I immediately bought the phone, I had buyers remorse, because I realized I could have gotten a phone with better specs like the Galaxy SII for a cheaper price, but since then I haven't had any problems with the phone. I've dropped it several times and its never broken, scratched or cracked(because I got a case for it) The only things I would say could improve are the Camera, and small storage only 8G.

Reviews.Title: Great phone, but battery life is not so good
Reviews.Author: Happydevo
Reviews.Content: Love the phone, but very dissappointed in the battery life. The features and functions of the phone are great, but only lasts a bit over a day if not used too much.

Reviews.Title: Beware of this seller
Reviews.Author: E. Estrada "eestrada"
Reviews.Content: I did not take seriously several reviews I read about this seller and phone, the phone came ok, it worked for 2 days after which it stopped recognizing the SIM card.Nothing I did helped. I am in Honduras and sending it back would be very expensive, so it is a total loss...UPDATE 12/18 ---> I took the cell phone to an official Tigo (Cell Phone Company) repair place, this cell phone came with a damaged replacement motherboard and it will cost me $185 plus 12% tax to fix = $207.20 I paid $235 for the phone plus $25 to send it overseas, $260 and now it will cost me almost as much to fix it...I wonder if this seems fair to the seller Cellular Kingdome. Cellular Kingdome would like for me to advise how we can fix this? Simple: Send me a new cell phone for which I paid for. Simple and easy.

Reviews.Title: Right answer

Reviews.Content: Although I have SIII mobile, all my family has SIII mini and I bought this one for them.The mobile answers all their expectation.

Reviews.Title: Worked fantastically

Reviews.Content: I really liked it. I received a phone which satisfied all of my expectations. My only gripe with this is that I ordered a blue colored phone and got a white colored phone. Pretty different but I decided to keep it.8 months after and it still works. Woohoo

Reviews.Title: Rubbish

Reviews.Content: This item was defective. The battery does not last 3 hours and when it dies, it takes like 4 hours to start charging. This was rubbish. Was a birthday present for my mom, who is abroad, and turned out to be the worst thing i've ever buy online.

Reviews.Title: Awesome!
Reviews.Author: Jonathan Almonte
Reviews.Content: Great and excellent.. I'm very confortable with this and it works in an excellent way; perfect stuff and just awesome!

Reviews.Title: All the bells and whistles and really small too.
Reviews.Author: Kristina M Ramstad
Reviews.Content: Love this phone!!!  All the bells and whistles and really small too.  Get yourself a 32GB SD card to go with it :)

Reviews.Content: Battery  life is horrible........I have to charge my phone everyday....this is not good.  Battery last just a couple of  hours, when I go back to work this will be a nuisance .

Reviews.Title: I love this phone!
Reviews.Author: D. Stevenson
Reviews.Content: This is a nice phone.  Note that this phone was made for use in Australia and the charger that comes with it won't work in the USA.  I think you can get an adapter to change this charger plug to a USA type wall plug.  I have no complaints at all with this phone.  If you want to down load the manual it can be found on the Samsung Australia web site.

Reviews.Title: Very good

Reviews.Content: Very good I like this telephone. I recived this on time and I haven't any problem with de purchase. Thank you

Reviews.Content: I loved my mini until it died and now it won't turn back on. I had it charging all day and it still won't turn on. It's a great phone, just don't let the battery get to 0% :(

Reviews.Title: good product

Reviews.Content: love it exactly what i expected . only one regret: I like my phone to look pretty and well it does but i would have loved a larger variety of choice for cases and colors

Reviews.Content: When I received the phone, English was already set. The only thing I did was take my SIM card from my old phone and put it in the new one. Put the battery in and let it fully charge, turned the phone on, called a friend to test it out.

Reviews.Content: I own S3 mini for about 2 months now and I can tell that is really good phone. The curved design sits very comfortably in the hand, and the smaller stature makes it easier to hold, with every part of the phone accessible one handed.

Reviews.Content: the product have nothing in spanish  even the charger is europeambut in general it's a good product, i will buy again

Reviews.Content: Some anomalies, but overall a pretty good phone. Great pictures. Occasionally won't answer the phone when swiped. Cannot delete synched contacts.

Reviews.Title: smart buy i don't have enymore to say
Reviews.Author: Abraham Albornoz
Reviews.Content: i love this phone, i'm happy to make this buy, the services was faster.  im happy very very happy no more to say

Reviews.Title: Be warned, serious charging problems.
Reviews.Author: Jeremy
Reviews.Content: I liked this phone I really did, the configuration felt right, the screen was clear with a good handle too it. The thing has horrible charging issues though, and random lockouts and crashes time to time. Now a month into having it, it's a brick that won't even respond to it's charger.I wish I had a clearer warning when I had bought it.

Reviews.Title: I recommend it. excellent
Reviews.Author: Elleenn Valbuena
Reviews.Content: the phone works great, fulfilled my expectations. the phone came with all accessories. very functional, zero problems. I recommend it. excellent

Reviews.Title: Good buy!
Reviews.Author: Douglas K. Jones "D  Jones"
Reviews.Content: My daughter loves this phone!  I haven't used it, but she swears by it, and pleasing her is not easy!

Reviews.Title: Keep shopping, this phone wasn't great!
Reviews.Author: LOVEGATORS
Reviews.Content: Don't buy this phone. The buttons are so small. Texting was a nightmare. Pictures were good quality. I ended up returning mine because the buttons would lock so I couldn't unlock the phone or open aps! The dealer was great. I recommend the original Galaxy III and not the mini. There are better phones out there for the price of this one. Shop around.

Reviews.Title: Good phone. Right Size. Smart Looking.
Reviews.Author: William Daniel
Reviews.Content: Very good phone,  Beautiful aesthetics with curved screen and very good quality image.  Fast processor makes streaming a pleasure.  Just the right size, same size ast the HTC Evo Design it replaced and not much larger that the Blackberry 9600 I had before that (I didn't want a one of these oversized phones that are out now, if I ever have a need for a larger screen, I'll carry a tablet).  Only downsides:  sometimes the touchscreen could be more sensitive, battery life is nothing to boast about, they should consider offering a larger battery option.  I'm not sure whether it's a hardware issue or software issue, but the GPS using Google Maps and Navigator sometimes gets confused (weak GPS read) at the worst times.

Reviews.Title: Well worth the money paid for it...
Reviews.Author: Yuri Arkadyev
Reviews.Content: Purchased this phone to substitute my original Samsung Galaxy S 4G and recently started using it. It has more internal memory - 8 GB instead of less than 1 GB for Galaxy S and I also put 16 GB storage card so there are plenty of space for all downloaded programs as well as photo and video data. Phone doesn't require frequent restarts like my Galaxy S did when it hangs down and so far I am fully satisfied by it's operation. Well worth the money paid for it!

Reviews.Title: Great phone at a great price. I am using with TMobile
Reviews.Author: Sal
Reviews.Content: Great phone at a great price. I am using with TMobile. I had no problem with it. Make sure read instructions that come with it.

Reviews.Title: The phone reboots itself randomly!
Reviews.Author: Ana Silva "Ana Corina"
Reviews.Content: The phone reboots itself randomly  =(  I don't know if it's a Samsung thing, because my last phone, a Galaxy Ace, did the same thing... This will make me reconsider buying another Samsung in the future.

Reviews.Title: Samsung Galaxy S III Mini
Reviews.Author: Sam
Reviews.Content: Fast shipping and the product was received in time could not ask for anything more. The FM radio helps and the 5 MP camera takes such good pictures. The price is not bad.

Reviews.Title: Love this phone!!!!!
Reviews.Author: beachbum
Reviews.Content: Bought this phone unlocked. I have T-Mobile. I did not want a huge phone. This one is the perfect size. The screen and the colors is really awesome. I had no issues with this phone. I just put in my sim card and boom!!! Started right up. The phone is really fast with opening apps. You will be pleased with this phone.

Reviews.Title: Perfect
Reviews.Author: Pamela Pena
Reviews.Content: It delivered faster than what I expected, came in a sealed box with all plastics and accesories and it was easy to start it. It worked for my carrier and it updated the software as soon as I turned it on. The battery lasts very long and I personally use my phone a lot througout the day. I would definately recommend this seller. Thank you so much!

Reviews.Title: Nice unlocked phone for the price
Reviews.Author: JMc
Reviews.Content: This is a nice phone for the price.  I got this phone for the Mrs. and it is perfect for her needs as she is not too picky about OS or apps, etc.  She uses it with the Tmo unlimited prepaid plan.

Reviews.Title: galaxy s3 mini
Reviews.Author: elda
Reviews.Content: It is awesome !!! Works perfectly not like the other phone I had to return ..I love my new galaxy 3 mini everything works the same as the regular size galaxy

Reviews.Title: Great phone for the money
Reviews.Author: Dan
Reviews.Content: this I s great phone it is almost the same as a Galaxy S3 but smaller so it fits in my pocket easily.

Reviews.Title: recomendado
Reviews.Author: jose delgado
Reviews.Content: Magnifico phone, the best phone I bought, I recommend it one hundred percent, plus the negotiation was quick, simple and hassle...

Reviews.Title: PERFECT
Reviews.Author: KAREN
Reviews.Content: IT'S PERFECT!!!!! I LOVE MY CELLPHONE A LOOOOOTTTTT.... WORKS PERFECTLY IN VENEZUELA..... IT HAS ALL THE APLICATIONS THAT I LIKE AND IT'S SO EASY TO USE

Reviews.Title: Excelent product
Reviews.Author: Leonardo Bonsanto

Reviews.Title: International version of SIII Mini
Reviews.Author: Jerry L. Pitts
Reviews.Content: I received an international version of the Mini. Once I selected English language, everything worked.  The down-side is the wall plug is European (240 volt?) and the manual was in French.  Looking on-line for the manual proved difficult since AT&T; just re-released the SIII Mini with upgrades and the manuals claim features that are not included with the Mini that I received.Good: Works great on Straight Talk (regular SIM, not micro). No problem setting it up once I realized the online instructions didn't match the slot I was looking for (I was looking at installing the SIM in the microSD slot).  Watched a YouTube video showing how to install both and everything worked great.I'm impressed with several of the installed Samsung apps (S Planner).  I wish I could get the same on my wife's Nexus 4.Bad:  Samsung does not recognize my phones MEI number, so I can't use any of the Samsung sync features.  Reviews of Kies advised me to stay away from it.Overall impression:  I'd do it again.

Reviews.Title: Great Phone! (Especially for first time Smartphone)
Reviews.Author: sh0pper1
Reviews.Content: Pros:*Sleek compact size*Highly customizable (especially after downloading certain apps)*Android OS (which does take a few days to get used to if you're unfamiliar)*Works very well with phone speed with Data (3G) and WiFi*Excellent call quality*No major bugs / glitches / technical difficultiesCons:*Can be somewhat glitchy sometimes (if you put a clock widget on your homescreen once In awhile it won't appear)*Not that customizable without downloading some apps for that purpose (very few home/lock screens, font styles, and call/text tones/notifications)*Sometimes the phone somewhat unlocks while in pocket (If you get a message/call it will sometimes unlock to the point where you end up dialing in the emergency dialer (which is typically a no harm/no foul situation) )*No way to easily silence the sound when you take a picture without silencing your phone entirely (there is a long process you can search)Overall:Overall it is a great phone and I would recommend it to anybody who wants to be in the smartphone generation but doesn't want/need all the "bells and whistles". All of the rave I have heard about the Samsung Galaxy family of phones is completely warranted. The Pros highly outweigh the Cons (I mean every phone has some growing pains/faults right?). Out of the box the phone like most smartphones looks pretty vulnerable to drop damage so buying a case is highly highly recommended. It took me a few days to get used to the Android system but I find it user friendly once you learn what all of the menus (particularly in the settings) contain. So to conclude if you're not in the market for a phone with all of the bells/whistles and just need a stable phone for years then this is the one for you.

Reviews.Title: Must Be Unlocked!
Reviews.Author: Angeline
Reviews.Content: The phone itself appears to be great if set up properly. I have a friend who loves it. However, mine came with a European charger which I resolved by using my Samsung tablet charger. It receives calls texts etc. and I am able to make calls, text, and take photos. That is the limit of my services because it does not appear to be "Unlocked". There are some instructions in German that do not change over to English.  It came set up for use with T-Mobile. Therefore I have to keep my data services off to avoid excessive charges from T-Mobile and Google connections. I was forced to set up Gmail which is locked into the phone. I've tried to delete it via bookmarks, but it doesn't help.It should not have taken me this long to get to the bottom of my problems. However, I am an amateur, just procuring the services of an expert who let me know it would have been belter for me if the phone was returned.Overall: Great phone, but seller error.I have contacted the seller and now awaiting a response.

Reviews.Title: Watch out, this is an European phone!
Reviews.Author: Evandro Menezes
Reviews.Content: I was considering getting this phone, but the 3G bands that it supports are those commonly found in Europe (900 and 2100MHz) and an extra one found in the Americas (1900MHz).  Some American carriers operate on 1900MHz and some Latin American ones, on 2100MHz, but this only means that depending on the specific country or on the specific city, one may found himself with 2G data only if one's not lucky.Getting an European phone that doesn't support the five 3G bands (850, 900, 1700, 1900, 2100MHz) used worldwide is asking for disappointment.

Reviews.Title: Good unlocked smartphone
Reviews.Author: N. Jones
Reviews.Content: There isn't much to complain about with this phone.  It is a perfect size to be truly mobile (i.e. carry in your pocket) and is as large as it can be while still allowing access to the full screen with a single thumb (unlike the full sized S3).  The display is crisp and clear.  The rear speaker is amazingly clear and loud -- I can actually hear the navigation app while driving.  Also, the rear LED is amazingly bright, which can be quite handy for things other than taking pictures.  Battery life is great, easily lasting all day unless I use it VERY heavily.My complaints are pretty minor:- It would be nice if the display got brighter when using outside... but it is still acceptable.- I can't understand why Samsung left a trivial sensor like a light sensor out of this phone... but it really doesn't bother me since the display really doesn't get that bright anyway.- This phone *requires* a case.  By that I mean that it is simply too slippery to use successfully long-term without fumbling it and dropping it routinely.  The fact that it is sleek and slim doesn't help either, although that is certainly not a complaint.  Luckily, there is a very nice case for this phone that has great grip and doesn't add much bulk:  B00AW692YW- It can be a little slow at times.  For example, pulling up the phone app often takes a couple of seconds.  For such a fundamental app, I would have hoped it would be better optimized.  Many other apps also take some time to open.  It isn't that bad, really, and doesn't generally bother me, but there is definite room for improvement.

OLED screens are quite nice.Pros: smallish form factor, thin, nice screen, fast processor, everything seems to work, newer version of androidCons:- power buttn is far too easy to push in pocket, requires a case to prevent that.- poor syncing with google. It seems better to use the native Samsung apps, which is uneccesarily complex, especially if you were used to using the native android google apps. I'm talking mainly gmail, calendar. Contacts work OK. It's really annoying when you set them phone up, to A) figure out that gmail syncing simpl6y doesn't work well, and then B) figurte out how to use the native Samsung apps AND have them sync with google. On the other hand, the native Samsung apps are nice.- Using this unlocked on Tmobile, it doesn't have the 1700 MHz band for Tmobile 3G and up, so you only get 3g+ in areas where TMobile has fully converted their towers to the 1900 MHz band. However, that is ongoing, and it seems to have mostly happened in my area. That said, I wouldn't say my internet is much faster than with my old LG optimus. That's probably a TMobile thing.- Again, it';s very easy to turn the darn thing on in your pocket, you ought to be able to specify which buttons activate it.- Battery life is basically one day. Don't expect to get 2 days out of it.

Reviews.Title: Nice little phone
Reviews.Author: pen name
Reviews.Content: This is my first smart phone and I am really enjoying all of the possibilities. I got the i8190L version which works good in the USA. The most important thing to me is that it is smaller and more affordable than the S3. Plus it has an AMOLED screen which is nice. Though it is lacking some feautures like MHL and USB OTG. Also It has no auto brightness. The processor can barely handle all the bloat-ware samsung put on there. But it works well and is fast enough in my opinion. The cell reception is as good as my old $20 pre-paid phone from wal-mart which got very good reception. I took the regular sized sim and put it right in the new phone. I kept my old number and all of my contacts that were stored on the sim, and it just worked. I like that because most phones these days have micro-sim. I also like the replaceable battery and the micro-SD slot. After using it a while it turns out I would have preferred a touch-sensitive home button instead of a physical one. None of these gripes I have are a deal breaker though and I am very happy with my new phone.

Only two or three things do not allow my absolute satisfaction at this time. First, the charger plug was not what I expected. I expected to receive a plug that can be used in the United States with voltage of 110v. The one I recived was intended to be used at Middle East countries. I also expected Spanish (my native language) to be one of the phone's default language, besides English of course, so I have to download the language addon. Another point to mention is that while on the phone box (as at Amazon's Order page) is printed the phone have 8GB of Internal Memory, the properties of Android system reflects the phone's Internal Memory is barely 4.55 Gb. I live in Ecuador so it is a bit harder to claim for a switch. There are certain things I can live with. So I'm going to enjoy my new phone and exploit all of its benefits

Reviews.Title: excellent product
Reviews.Author: Francisco Espinoza "Estudent"
Reviews.Content: great phone.Here are some highlights:- It has a regular size SIM card, therefore no need to cut it. When you travel abroad usually you get a local regular size SIM and save on roaming.- it has a beautiful screen, just the right size. I wish Galaxy S3 had this screen because the one it has is way too big and can't be operated with one hand.- Battery life is impressive, with just the voice and WIFI turned on it managed to run close to 4 (four) days on one charge. You can see that complaining on short battery life is not productive at all since it is not just phone's fault. There are many factors that contribute to short battery life: wireless coverage in the area you live, whether you have all possible social gimmicks turned on that keep draining your battery, running apps in background that are poorly written and waste CPU cycles, amount of time the screen is on and so on.Hope this review is helpful. I am happy with the phone and would recommend it to my friends.

Reviews.Title: Wasn't happy with the size of the space listed. Says 8G phone says 4.54G.
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: The phone works pretty good but the advertisement wasn't quite right. Supposed to be 8G for space and if you go into the settings it says total space is 4.52G which is way off from 8G. I filled it up pretty quick. It doesn't have SBeam as well which was something I wanted or that is what sold me. I wanted the smaller phone (mini) so this one is a little bigger than the samsung admire but functions better than the admire. I already have the phone almost filled up and have the apps I was interested in but not too much more for other apps. Also if you never had one of these android phones, the programs are like commercials. Many of the free one's have permissions you have to agree to when you install it.Also you should buy a screen protector. Scratched glass slightly first month of use. Now you see some shine of color in a white background.Battery life doesn't last too long as well. You can kill a battery in 5 hours of use. (1500mAh)

Reviews.Title: Nice phone but has issues
Reviews.Author: Hayk Saribekyan
Reviews.Content: The very first day I bought this item I found out that GPS is not working. Initially I though it is because of the weather but after some time it would record my 5km runs as 0.23km which is definitely not correct. After couple of weeks of testing, trying it with GPS status I replaced it with another phone of the same model. And now I regret it.After using it for a month, last week I noticed that my messages are not getting delivered (brings up failing randomly). And then suddenly everything is fine. Friends were complaining that they cannot reach me. Before last week everything was 100% alright. I haven't dropped the phone, I have contacted AT&T.; They say everything is ok from their side but then again - I am getting very frequent errors "not registered on network", "invalid MMI code".Now the return window is closed and I do not have an idea what to do. I will try to get in touch with AT&T; again but I doubt it is because of AT&T.;Being an android fun (and Google employee) I guess I have to switch to iPhone and get rid of a random trouble.

Reviews.Title: Great phone
Reviews.Author: RobotZombieQueen
Reviews.Content: I love my Samsung!  This phone looks just as good as it's big brother, but it's not too big to operate with one small hand like mine.  I had an HTC Evo 3D for about a month before this phone, and it was just so big I had to have two hands on it at all times.  The picture on this phone is clear and crisp, and while it may not have quite as many features as it's larger counterpart, the differences are hardly noticeable in my opinion.I think the worst thing about this phone is that it's not 4G capable.  However, depending on your network, this little sucker is still fast!  I'm currently with TMobile, and I was told when I activated the phone that their network did not provide 3G or 4G to this particular phone, so I would be stuck with 2G.  The phone and the network were still a vast improvement from the supposed 4G I was getting from Virgin Mobile previously.Overall, I would recommend this phone to anyone who wants a nice phone without all the bulk.

Reviews.Title: phone 4 stars - android 1 star
Reviews.Author: jerryn "jay"
Reviews.Content: I tried this phone recently (02/13) and found hardware wise it was quite good. Worked very well on at&t; gophone net with existing sim card. Screen looked fine to me graphically, but internet type was too small to read by default, and I could not increase it without chopping up pages. BT/wifi worked just fine in USA (phone came from Poland). Phone is a nice size if you don't have big hands as I really don't want to have to use 2 hands to hold a phone securely, let alone use it. The problem was android is still messy OS (4.2.1) IMHO, after all these years. I had no control over home screen icons (Samsung or Android issue ? not sure or maybe both) and ended up with several blank, orphaned screens that would not delete.  I really don't want to spend hours hunting for 3rd party apps that actually make a phone useable for basic needs. That should be covered out of the box. I later found an app that would have given me such user control but had already returned the unit. So if your into doing a lot of OS fiddling this is a great phone. Went back to 3GS becuase everything on need is on home screen, even though I abhor Itunes.  This was my second go at android, first was Galaxy SII, and the OS is still a mess. Gave phone 4 stars based on hardware.
